info.name: Wilma darkmode U
info.description:
Wilma dark mode theme
jos on rikki niin anna kommenti jossa on se url jolla ei toimi.
info.additionalInfo:
v1.3.2
-hopefully fixed attendance

v1.3.1
-got rid of some white seperator lines in the attendance page

v1.3
-the message writing iframe* is now dark
-message replies are now dark
-fixed appointments having some white rows
-messages** now have more readable links

*editing iframe css doesn't work on all browsers or css injecting extensions
**as messages are iframes they might be unchanged depending on your browser and extension

v1.2
-added regexp, now the style should apply to all Wilmas 
  <<<(https://).*(inschool.fi).* >>>
-updated description

v1.1
-changed input fields to be dark
-fixed a few tables having white rows

v1
-release
